entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
